text: Herr Puntila and His Servant Matti (German: Herr Puntila und sein Knecht Matti) is a 1960 Austrian German comedy movie directed by Alberto Cavalcanti and was based on the 1948 play of the same name by Bertolt Brecht. It stars Curt Bois, Heinz Engelmann, Maria Emo, Dorothea Neff, Edith Prager, Karl Skraup, Max Brod, Peter Sturm. ==Other websites== * Category:1960 comedy movies Category:Austrian comedy movies Category:German comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Alberto Cavalcanti Category:Movies set in Finland
title: Herr Puntila and His Servant Matti
